title: What are your favorite punk lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: It has to be these ones from Bodies by the Sex Pistols. She was a girl from BirminghamShe just had an abortionShe was a case of insanityHer name was Pauline she lived in a tree She was a no-one who killed her babyShe sent her letters from the countryShe was an animalShe was a bloody disgrace Body I'm not an animalMummy I'm not an abortion Dragged on a table in a factoryIllegitimate place to beIn a packet in a lavatoryDie little baby screaming Body screaming fucking bloody messIt's not an animal it's an abortion Body I'm not an animalBody I'm not an abortion Throbbing squirm, gurgling bloody messI'm not a discharge I'm not a loss inProtein I'm not a throbbing squirm Ah! Fuck this and fuck thatFuck it all and fuck the fucking bratShe don't want to baby that looks like thatI don't want to baby that looks like that. Body I'm not an animalBody I'm not an abortion Mummy! Ugh!
